description: Control and query Rigol DHO824 oscilloscope for waveform capture and measurements

environmentVariables.name: RIGOL_RESOURCE
environmentVariables.description: VISA resource string for connecting to the oscilloscope (e.g., 'TCPIP0::192.168.1.100::inst0::INSTR').

environmentVariables.name: RIGOL_BEEPER_ENABLED
environmentVariables.description: Enable or disable oscilloscope beeper sounds

environmentVariables.name: RIGOL_TEMP_DIR
environmentVariables.description: Host-side path for returned file paths. The container writes to /tmp/rigol internally and translates paths to this value in responses. Must match the host path in your -v mount. Required for Docker usage.

runtimeArguments.name: --rm
runtimeArguments.description: Automatically remove the container when it exits

runtimeArguments.name: -v
runtimeArguments.description: Bind mount a host directory into the container

runtimeArguments.description: Set an environment variable in the runtime
